name: @luvies/lazy
description: A linq-like lazy iteration module that aims to support deno, node & browser
author: luvies

scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist/* && deno --allow-read --allow-write https://gist.githubusercontent.com/luvies/d85fc46c5b4e255b845743082bdbc3c0/raw/fcad5914596c75f72868500c87493f5cc569629e/node_prebuild.ts --in lib --out prebuild && tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json
